thread.title: Michigan high school unveils monument to Kiss - NOLA.com
thread.title_full: Michigan high school unveils monument to Kiss - NOLA.com - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: NOLA.com
title: Michigan high school unveils monument to Kiss - NOLA.com
text:
In this Oct. 9, 1975 file photo, members of the rock band KISS, from top left: Paul Stanley, Peter Criss, Ace Frehley and Gene Simmons, line up behind two members of the Cadillac High School Vikings football team, wearing KISS facepaint, in Cadillac, Mich. The small northern Michigan city is celebrating the 40th anniversary of an unforgettable visit by rock 'n' roll band Kiss with two days of events and a monument dedicated to the band.
 NOLA.com.
